Original:
簡單吧位於台北士林區，在簡陋的外表下，提供精緻餐點與故事特調，為每一個故事創造專屬於故事角色的味覺饗宴。這次巧巧特調「巧巧特調」以琴酒為基底，選用英國琴酒代表遠自異國的主人，而PROCIA代表調皮活潑的巧巧，咖啡代表著多數人一天中的精神來源，就像是巧巧對Neal來說是一天中的精神寄託。希望每個人都能找到屬於自己的精神支柱，並且帶著美好的回憶繼續前行。

從2024/04/01起，為期一年，至2025/01/31，每點一杯「巧巧特調」，店家就會捐贈100元給動保協會老齢汪喵醫療照顧專案。喝杯酒，幫助狗狗。讓愛延續！

地址：台北市士林區大北路42號
Address: No. 42, Dabei Rd, Shilin District, Taipei City
營業時間 Open Time：20：00 - 3：00

more: instagram @alcoholneal
EN:
Simply located in Shilin District, Taipei. Under the humble appearance, it provides exquisite meals and storytelling, creating a taste feast that is exclusive to the character character for each story.This time, the "ingenuity" is based on the piano wine, and the British piano wine represents the owner of the foreign country, and Procia represents the naughty and lively ingenuity. Like Qiao Qiao is a spiritual sustenance for Neal.I hope everyone can find their own spiritual pillar and continue to move forward with beautiful memories.

From 2024/04/01, for a year, to 2025/01/31, each cup of "clever tone", the store will donate 100 yuan to the Dynamic Insurance Association Lao Xun Wang Meow medical care project.Drink a glass of wine and help your dog.Let love continue!

Address: No. 42, Daibei Road, Shilin District, Taipei City
Address: No. 42, Dabei RD, Shilin Distribu
Opening hours Open Time: 20: 00 -3:00

More: Instagram @Alcoholneal

Original:
服務生顧著自己人聊天，不是很認真做調酒😫
做調酒期間也一直摔到東西，用完的雪克杯與其他器具在清洗時也都用丟了或是從手上掉落（非常多次，發生頻率很高）一直聽到東西掉落聲觀感不是很好！
接下來到重點環節的調酒，同行的朋友點了一杯速度藥水，外觀跟名字都非常酷沒錯！
但喝了一口就喝到吸管的碎玻璃！！因為服務生放吸管也是丟進酒杯裡上給客人，導致玻璃吸管碎裂！！
速度藥水其實是加速進醫院吧🙃當下跟服務生反應也只得到幫你換一杯新的，也沒有任何的道歉與關心，真的可以不用光顧這家酒吧，士林還有更多的好酒吧可以去謝謝🙏
附上不好喝的調酒，調酒內的茶喝起來苦澀，很像是放了很久，與調酒也無法融合起來，茶是茶酒是酒，兩個獨立的個體！建議大家可以不用喝，換別家吧！
—————————————————————————

10/22回覆店家留言
感謝您的迅速回覆，也感謝您終於正視此次事件與回覆我們的問題
1.同行友人的評論已留言超過一週了，至今尚未獲得回應，並未像店家說的已被回覆的問題再次拿上來評論
2.喝到碎玻璃的當下，友人馬上與店家反應，並說這應該要換一杯新的吧？服務生也馬上回應幫我們換一杯新的速度藥水，應該是他剛剛放太大力造成玻璃碎裂，從頭到尾沒有說過「濾掉」就好，我們還是很重視自身的生命安全，沒有想加速進醫院的想法，很明顯店家的回覆與事實不相符
3.坐超過一小時是因為花許多時間等調酒，我們可以體諒假日人潮眾多，店家人手不足，從沒拿等候時間抱怨過，但這不代表等候的久就是對你們的店滿意，從發生喝到碎玻璃調酒未獲得道歉開始，就對貴店失望透頂，快速喝完當下的調酒離開
EN:
The waiter cares about their own people, not very serious about bartending 😫
During the bartender period, I have been fell to the same thing. The Xuek Cup and other appliances that are used up are lost or dropped from my hand (a lot of times, high frequency). The sense of view is not very good!
Next to the key link, friends who peers ordered a cup of speed potion, the appearance and name are very cool, right!
But drink the broken glass of the straw after taking a bite!IntersectionBecause the waiter put a straw into the wine glass for the guests, the glass straw is broken!Intersection
Speed ​​potion is actually accelerating to enter the hospital. The response to the waiter can only help you change a new one without any apology and concern. You can really do n’t need to patronize this bar. Shilin and more good bars can be used. You can go to thank you
Attach the sake that is not delicious, the tea in the bartender is bitter, it looks like it has been put for a long time, and it cannot be merged with the bartender. Tea is tea wine and wine, two independent individuals!It is recommended that you don't need to drink it, change your home!
———————————————————————

10/22 reply to the store's message
Thank you for your quick reply, and thank you for finally facing the incident and replying to our question
1. The comments of accompanying friends have been commented for more than a week. So far, they have not received a response, and they have not scored again as the restaurant said.
2. At the moment of drinking broken glass, friends immediately responded to the store and said that this should be a new one?The waiter also immediately responded to helping us change a new cup of speed potion. It should be that he just put it too hard to cause the glass to break. It was not said that "filtering" from beginning to end. The idea of ​​accelerating to enter the hospital is obviously that the reply of the store does not match the facts
3. Sitting for more than an hour is because spending a lot of time waiting for bartending. We can understand that there are many crowds of holidays, and the shopkeeper has insufficient hands. I have never complained about waiting time. After drinking the broken glass bartender, I was disappointed with your shop without an apology.

飲料超級均衡，採用當地風味，如蜜梅、烏龍、抹茶、大麥茶，氣氛涼爽。服務非常友好，我們喜歡我們嘗試的每一種飲料。價格非常合理！

只收現金。 （或至少暫時如此）

Cash only.(Or at least temporarily)
